body.raw:
/*
 * The point of this test is to check if a number can be passed in for isbn13 as well as a string
 */
{
    "isbn13": {{randomISBN13}},
    "authors": "{{$randomLastName}}",
    "publication_year": {{randomPublicationYear}},
    "title": "{{$randomWord}}",
    "rating_1_star": "{{randomInt}}",
    "rating_2_star": "{{randomInt2}}",
    "rating_3_star": "{{randomInt3}}",
    "rating_4_star": "{{randomInt}}",
    "rating_5_star": "{{randomInt2}}",
    "image_url": "{{$randomBusinessImage}}",
    "image_small_url": "{{$randomNightlifeImage}}"
}
